Description: Available 10/1! This prime West Broadway location offers so much at your fingertips. This 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit is spacious with modern finishes and hardwood flooring. The open living and kitchen area provides a perfect space for entertaining. The modern kitchen features custom cabinetry, marble countertops and a large island. The generous sized bedroom is equipped with plenty of closet space. In-unit laundry and heated garage parking are added bonuses to this home. Conveniently located moments from South Boston's restaurants, shops and the Broadway T Station! Don't miss out!
